text: Not more the proud of SG kaya toast shop like last time. Price increased 40% as compare to 2-3yrs ago and the portion (size of bread) shrunk... Table become smaller and super pack in the store. Will not be our choice of breakfast anymore... too disappointed to see Toastbox become like this.
Worst toast box kopi ever taken in Sg.  Still get more than 3 star.  Kelong is it?  Place is hot in afternoon.   Staffs are poker players.

2024-09: Simple local food at a convenient location from the MRT and mall, with a view of the upcoming ITH site.
Often busy at peak times.
Food seems mostly prepared in advance fast food style, so not the place to go if you have higher expectations.
Rotating specials on advertised on sign boards outside.
Went to check in my curry...they had forgotten / missed it. Not the first time...not a busy time either.

Always my comfort coffee, But today was Wow... Laksa gravy thickness just nice, not overly powered. The ham and cheese was great today cos the bread was covered and toasted with butter. Soft boiled eggs cooked just nice to fall out fully from shelf. Really enjoy my dinner today.

Had the Spiced drum curry rice set
The curry is ok, not great
Chicken drum is tasteless , dry and tough
Cost:- $15.30
